summary: The module provides a comprehensive suite of unit tests for the EMR Serverless service, covering creation, deletion, retrieval, listing, starting, stopping, updating of applications, as well as job run lifecycle actions like start, get, list, and cancel. It leverages Moto to mock AWS interactions and pytest fixtures to set up test scenarios and validate both successful operations and error handling.
business_intent: Ensure that the EMR Serverless API client correctly implements all supported operations and robustly handles invalid inputs, edge cases, and pagination, thereby guaranteeing reliable integration with AWS services.
